pf2e-threat-tracker.threatConfig.name: Name
pf2e-threat-tracker.threatConfig.title: Configure Threat
pf2e-threat-tracker.notifications.enable: Scene reload required to apply changes
pf2e-threat-tracker.notifications.threat: In order to see if the threat panel theme had effect, enter on combat, if you are already on combat, close it and open again.
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.attackThrea: Attacks reduce threat instead of applying it
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.baseAttackT: Amount of threat generated when an attack hits
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.baseHealThr: Base threat generated when healing an ally, to which the amount healed is added
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.baseSpellTh: Base threat generated when casting a spell, to which the amount of damage dealt is added
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.enableThrea: Enables threat by adding Effect items to tokens in combat.
Disable this if you don't want to see the floating threat table on the canvas
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.enableTopTh: Displays a visual effect on the token with the most threat
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.enableIWR.h:
Enables the IWR rule. If the affected token has any kind of Immunity/Weakness/Resistance, a multiplier will be added.
x0 Final Threat for Immunities,
x1.X Threat for Weaknesses/Resistances, where X is the value of the creature's Weakness/Resistance.
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.effectExclu: Compendia excluded from the threat list for effects items
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.skillBase.h: Base threat generated by a Skills and Feats maneuver
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.skillBase.n: Base Threat from Skills and Feats
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.skillCritBo: Additional threat generated on a critical success in a skill/feat maneuver
Bonus Threat from Critical Skills and Feats
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.threatPerSp: Additional threat generated when casting a spell for each rank of the spell.
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.topThreatEf: Path of the visual asset that will be displayed on the target with the most threat (recommended JB2A)
Visual Effect for Top Threat (Requires Sequencer)
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.xFactor.hin: Horizontal offset of the threat panel (in pixels)
pf2e-threat-tracker.settings.yFactor.hin: Vertical offset of the threat panel (in pixels)
pf2e-threat-tracker.Settings.decayFactor: Determines how quickly threat values converge to the average each round. 0 equalizes all threats to the average, 1 applies only decay without additional convergence.
Panel theme class. The theme does not apply automatically, specially for those themes that has any kind of background image. You have to close combat and enter again or change scene to reload the game canvas, or reload the foundry application with F5.
pf2e-threat-tracker.Settings.unconscious: The amount of threat reduced by getting the 'Unconscious' condition, this value is percentual of the own threat value for each enemy.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.unknownMessageT: Unknown Message Type. Saving tokens data as precaution.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.emptyContextSlu: Empty context, searching slug previously defined.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.cannotGetSlug: Cannot get Slug for this message.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.reduceModeDetec: Reduce Mode detected, reversing threat value.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.healingSpellDet: Healing Spell detected, threat will be calculated as healing
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.spellNoRank: Spell has no valid rank value.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.attackSkillNotR: Attack or Skill action not recogniced:
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.noTargetedToken: There are no targeted tokens to apply threat to.
pf2e-threat-tracker.logs.noValidHealingT: No valid token to apply healing threat
pf2e-threat-tracker.Settings.maxVisibleC: Maximum number of threat cards visible in the panel without scrolling. (No reload is required but if changed is recommended to quickly switch scene and come back to apply the new value, only if you are already in combat).
